channel.title: Server Hosting
channel.description:
Ok, Heres my problem
Ive got a source, Static Ip, Ive got a portforwarded Port, (Default Through UTorrent, No belkin tuts and i couldent follow PF.coms)
I sent my source to a mate, he edited the batch file, and this works for me I can compile and runserv perfectly, Im using the Allstar-scape v2 I Runserv before Utorrent, (with all the Stay same ip, All access allowed on it) Otherwise i cant run because of port in use by Utorrent Open No-Ip (Razzyscape.no-ip.biz) Everythings fine and operational Open Silab "Error Connecting to server" after around 2 seconds of trying
=/
Help..
PS: I Went of a couple of tuts, Stomies on here, And Danny's On Havenworld
Still, Im stuck at this final hurdle!

item.title: Server Hosting
item.dc:creator: @BeforeHell BeforeHell
item.description:
@BeforeHell wrote:

How do you mean, Software?

Im using No-ip (obv) but the first server i made wasent on my static, it was my PROPER IP, i dunno if i have to Pf, looks like it tho =/

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @_kidz `kidz
item.description:
@_kidz wrote:

You have to run the static no-ip so you can get on…

What software are you using to make the server?

item.title: Server Hosting
item.dc:creator: @nemisesv2 nemisesv2
item.description:
@nemisesv2 wrote:

here m8 i jus made this tut like 20 mins ago http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,303685.0.html[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 11, 2008, 02:23:41 pm[/size][hr][quote=“JaydenD12, post:1, topic:230654”]you don’t run your server off ur no-ip the hoster has to use 127.0.0.1 i had the same prob with my server.[/quote]
well i can log in using my local address and my server ip with no problm

Read full topic
